original_text: Jeroboam built shrines on high places and appointed priests from all sorts of people, even though they were not Levites.
korean_text: 그가 또 산당들을 짓고 레위 자손 아닌 보통 백성으로 제사장을 삼고

sentences.original_text: Jeroboam built shrines on high places
